Html:
Can one of you guys post out a discussion topic or something when the code stabilizes enough for some of us to download and try out the plugins and changes?  I see you making changes each day, but I'm not sure when a good time would be to jump in and give it a go.  I assume their are a variety of database changes since Feb, etc.

Anyway, reading through the various changes to source it looks like good fun!

Sure, can do.  I'll at least definitely Twitter about it.  We're meeting with the team that built the initial execution engine we started with on Monday.  We'll be mostly done by then, but may take a few more days afterwards to continue cleanup.  Glad you like what you're seeing.  We think it's going to be pretty powerful and easy to develop with.
